acceptance-test-run.title: <= 0.5 day training and only two trainers are qualified
acceptance-test-run.name: <= 0.5 day training and only two trainers are qualified

test-group.name: [1] {status=working elsewhere, availability=unavailable, available_on_another_moment_this_day=no, action=invite, response=unavailable, new_action=reschedule class}

test-step.description: Given the trainer has a status {working elsewhere}
And only two trainers are qualified to give this course
And the trainer availability is {unavailable}
When the answer to is the trainer available on another moment this day is {no}
And the action is {invite}
And the trainer response is {unavailable}
Then the new action is {reschedule class}
